title: Request Showing Feedback
description: After a buyer's agent shows a property, the listing agent follows up to request feedback.

tasks.description: Identify that a showing was completed the previous day.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent's system flags a completed showing.

tasks.description: Send an automated email or text to the buyer's agent with a link to a feedback form.
Compile any feedback received and share it with the seller.
tasks.expected_outcome: The seller receives a summary of feedback from recent showings.
